full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
**Electro Optic Spare Parts**

### Tender Details

*   Reference Number: cb-258-14695135
*   Solicitation Number: W8486-249199/AS
*   Amendment Number: 9
*   Publication Date: 2023-10-04
*   Tender Closing Date: 2023-11-13T14:00:00
*   Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-11-27
*   Expected Contract End Date: 2024-03-15

### Tender Description

The Department of National Defence is soliciting proposals for electro-optic spare parts. The tender involves the supply of various items, including hose assemblies, manifolds, fittings, input assemblies, blanking plugs, level benches, electrical equipment supports, capacitor objectives, protective covers, calibrators, protractors, and electrical insulating sleeving.

*   Item 1: Hose Assembly (Quantity: 10)
*   Item 2: Manifold (Quantity: 10)
*   Item 3: Fitting (Quantity: 20)
*   Item 4: Input Assembly (Quantity: 10)
*   Item 5: Blanking Plug (Quantity: 15)
*   Item 6: Level Bench (Quantity: 35)
*   Item 7: Electrical Equipment Supports (Quantity: 10)
*   Item 8: Capacitor Objectives (Quantity: 60)
*   Item 9: Protective Covers (Quantity: 30)
*   Item 10: Calibrators (Quantity: 11)
*   Item 11: Protractors (Quantity: 90)
*   Item 12: Electrical Insulating Sleeving (Quantity: 25)

### Delivery and Return

Deliveries will be made to:

*   Depot at 25 CFSD, Montreal, Quebec
*   7 CFSD Edmonton, Alberta

### Contracting Entity

*   Contracting Entity: Department of National Defence
*   Contracting Entity Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, On K1A 0K2

### Contact Information

*   Contact Person: Julie Grenier
*   Contact Email: [julie.grenier2@forces.gc.ca](mailto:julie.grenier2@forces.gc.ca)
*   Contact Phone: (613) 406-8821

### Trade Agreements

*   Canada-Peru
